name: NSCollectionLayoutAnchor
desc: An object that defines how to attach a supplementary item to an item in a collection view.

items.name: init(edges: NSDirectionalRectEdge)
items.desc: Creates an anchor with the specified edges to attach to.

items.name: init(edges: NSDirectionalRectEdge, absoluteOffset: CGPoint)
items.desc: Creates an anchor with the specified edges to attach to, offset by the provided absolute value.

items.name: init(edges: NSDirectionalRectEdge, fractionalOffset: CGPoint)
items.desc: Creates an anchor with the specified edges to attach to, offset by the provided fractional value.

items.name: var edges: NSDirectionalRectEdge
items.desc: The edges of the item an anchor is attached to.

items.name: var offset: CGPoint
items.desc: The floating-point value of the anchor's offset from the item it's attached to.

items.name: var isAbsoluteOffset: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the anchor's offset is expressed as an absolute value.

items.name: var isFractionalOffset: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the anchor's offset is expressed as a fraction of its supplementary item's dimension.
